reviews.text:
The best Brewery in San Marino!

I got a chance to visit and take a look inside this amazing looking Brewery. The entrance was not easy to find but the extra effort put in to find this place was 100% worth it. The owner is very friendly and gladly shares his passion for brewing beer which you can taste in his wonderful selection of beers. I got the chance to try a few actually. I would highly recommend to try the 'Nostalgia di Bambergia'. It has got to be one of the most unique beers I ever had. You can drink then here in the pub or purchase them for on the go, so of course I had to take some beers home myself.

So if you are ever in the area and enjoy a good beer than this place is a must visit.

Brewpub beside the carpark near the castle. Good variety of craft beers. IPAs are very tasty. Convenient place to grab a pint or two. Very friendly staff.

Great little place. Personal was really friendly  and let us taste al their beers. We bought some for back home. Didn‚Äôt get to taste the food but next time we‚Äôre in San Marino we are definitely coming back.

Had a fabulous couple of beers and sandwiches in this beautiful spot in San Marino! The guys here were helpful and the beers really good! Wasn‚Äôt expensive- about ‚Ç¨5 a beer and sandwiches (really tasty) for about ‚Ç¨10

If you love craft beers and find yourself in San Marino, visit Birrificio Abusivo! The owner has created some great beers! I ended having the IPA and stout - they were so good I brought bottles of each to take home!
